tables.title: Legwork Findings
tables.description: Phone taps, stakeouts, and hallway gossip that move investigations forward.

entries.result: A neighbor keeps seeing the victim visit a rooftop apiary at odd hours.
A rideshare log shows the same driver circling the block before pickup.
Security cam catches someone swapping badge lanyards in a lobby alcove.
A barista recognizes a suspect by an unusual tattoo of a subway map.
A courier delivered an unmarked package to the wrong suite and filmed the recipient.
Building maintenance reports a stuck elevator that paused at a hidden service floor.
A late-night talk-radio caller shares coordinates for a rumored dead drop.
A parking attendant admits a classic car was stored for cash, no questions asked.
